Description.Name: Free Rasalhague Republic
Description.Details: The [[DM.Factions[faction_Rasalhague],Free Rasalhague Republic]] was your home, adapting quickly to change and hardship.

OptionDescription:
MechWarriors who hail from the [[DM.Factions[faction_Rasalhague],Free Rasalhague Republic]] show a remarkable level of competence, considering their short history. They adapt well even to dire conditions, used to frequent ambushes from periphery pirates. Their small unit tactics rival any military in the Inner Spheres, highlighting them as an impressive and cohesive fighting force.

 It is only in the fielding and management of larger operations, such as multi-Regimental and larger combined arms actions, that the lack of experience of the KungsArmé Command is truly exposed, a weakness made most of by the Draconis Combine and various Clans alike.
BioDescription: You grew up in the Free Rasalhague Republic, adapting quickly to change and hardship. MechWarriors who hail from the Free Rasalhague Republic show a remarkable level of competence, considering their short history. They adapt well even to dire conditions, used to frequent ambushes from periphery pirates. Their small unit tactics rival any military in the Inner Spheres, highlighting them as an impressive and cohesive fighting force.
